desc: A Division of Stumptown Stitch, based in Montana. Ripple Wear Outfitters is a clothing brand of craft merchandise influenced by the music of the Grateful Dead. Wear what you love. Love what you wear. Shop our online store for unique hats and apparel. We design, manufacture, and fulfill product in-house. Thank you.

layout.text: Inspired by the mountains around us and the music of the Grateful Dead
